field.name: description
field.value: This is the default email template used for generating notifications on pooled task assignment.

field.name: content
field.value:
<#assign lang=notifications.getUserLanguage(user)> <#assign title=target.properties['title']> Hello, ${user.properties['firstName']},
there is new pooled task <#if parent?? >on project ${parent.properties['identifier']},${codelists.getCodeValue(2, parent.properties['type']).properties[lang]}, ${parent.properties['title']}, which you can claim and then work on:
Task ID: ${target.properties['identifier']}
Task type: ${codelists.getCodeValue(227, target.properties['type']).properties[lang]}
Title: ${title}
Planned end date: ${target.properties['plannedEndDate']?string("MMMMM/dd/yyyy")}
Creator: ${notifications.getDisplayName(target.properties['createdBy'])}
Priority: ${codelists.getCodeValue(208, target.properties['priority']).properties[lang]}
To view all task details click the link below:
${title}
Regards,
Administrator
